text: Belen (; ) is the second most populous city in Valencia County, New Mexico, United States, after its county seat Los Lunas. The population was 7,360 in 2020 census data. Belen is Spanish for Bethlehem but gained the nickname "The Hub City". Belen is at the southern end of the Albuquerque. The city is located 35 miles south of Albuquerque. ==References== Category:Cities in New Mexico
title: Belen, New Mexico
